item.title: FT Most Read: Friday, April 12, 2024 at 6:50 PM UTC
item.description:
1.  Forget boomers vs millennials, the next conflict is millennials vs each other
2. A $10bn car? The trend for hyper-personalised cars gains momentum
3.  What eight centuries of data tell us about interest rates
4. US proposes debt to fund Ukraine using profits from frozen Russian assets
5. Police launch probe into claims Angela Rayner broke electoral law
